page.headline: to sell your property with Puretime

steps.title: 1. Tell Us About Your Property
steps.description: Contact us today, Fill out our form and send us details about your property.

steps.title: 2. Receive Your Offer
steps.description: We will make you an offer on your property.

steps.title: 3. Sell Your Property
steps.description: If you accept our offer, you can sit back, relax and we will sell your property for you!
